name: John The Icecube
description:
John The Icecube is a game made in 48 hours on Ludum Dare 50.

# Controls

  • Directional Keys - Move the Aim
  • Space - Load the Jump
  • R - Reset to the last checkpoint

# Changelog

The Jam Version currently tweaks the snowflakes to respawn again after a while and increases the aim speed because it was impossible to get past some areas. The web version is the Jam version.
